preference.name: AWC_visStdViewOrientationFront
preference.preference_description: Specifies the camera orientation for the Front view for the Viewer in the Active Workspace client. Back's camera orientation value will be set opposite of Front. Valid values are: * +x : Sets the Front view orientation to +x * +y : Sets the Front view orientation to +y. This is the default value. * +z : Sets the Front view orientation to +z * -x : Sets the Front view orientation to -x * -y : Sets the Front view orientation to -y * -z : Sets the Front view orientation to -z
